text: tatha unhonne kahaah yadi ham anusaran karen maargadarshan ka aapake saath, to apanee dharatee se uchak[1] lie jaayenge. kya hamane nivaas sthaan nahin banaaya hai bhayarahit "haî€¼ram"[2] ko unake lie, khinche chale aa rahe hain jisakee or pratyek prakaar ke phal, jeevika svaroop, hamaare paas se? aur parantu unamen se adhiktar log nahin jaanate
